description:
(i) The Licence Holder shall cap the borehole to prevent uncontrolled artesian overflow. 

(ii) The Licence Holder shall fit a capping plate with a pressure gauge of suitable sensitivity to enable the artesian head to be measured.

(iii) The Licence Holder shall ensure that the borehole capping plate is drilled and tapped to form a dip hole at least <<dip tube diameter>> millimetres in diameter.

(iv) The Licence Holder shall position the hole on the capping plate so that a cable dipper can be lowered to record the water level without fouling installed equipment.
